TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidDropSampleBuffer (MonoTouch.AVFoundation.IAVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate This, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureOutput captureOutput, MonoTouch.CoreMedia.CMSampleBuffer sampleBuffer, MonoTouch.AVFoundation.AVCaptureConnection connection);
